main.name: Ted Peters
main.bio: Full Stack Developer with demonstrated experience across the Software Development Lifecycle focused in Javascript. I love the feeling of overcoming a difficult challenge in the development process and taking applications for the dev stage to prod. In my free time I love to cook, hike, skate, listen to reggae, paint, and swim laps at the local YMCA.
main.contactmessage: If you are interested in contacting me for anything, please email me directly. If you prefer to talk by phone just include your info in your message so I can get back to you as soon as possible.

projects.title: Squawk
projects.category: click here to see the code
projects.description: Uses python web framework, Django as well as Django's HTML templates for the front-end. Users are validated through Django’s out of the box authentication system with an additional user model. Images are stored in an AWS S3 Bucket. Site is hosted on heroku.

projects.title: AdvenSure
projects.category: click here to see the code
projects.description: Full Stack “MERN'' Application that uses passport.js and custom hooks for user authorization. Packing list information is updated by 'use effect' hooks. Site is hosted by Heroku

projects.title: Mobile Wallet
projects.category: click here to see the code
projects.description: This banking app is an example of a progressive web application I created. This can be downloaded and used offline.

projects.title: Get Me Outta Here (GO'H)
projects.category: click here to see the code
projects.description: Node application that will find outdoor activities near the users location using the 'MapBox' API. Also supports real time weather alerts around the potential destination using the 'Open Weather Map' API

projects.title: Employee Directory
projects.category: click here to see the code
projects.description: Employee Directory is a React application that uses the context API hook to render the context value of all employees.

projects.title: React Reading List
projects.category: click here to see the code
projects.description: This personal assistant will store your upcoming book lists using Node, Express, and MongoDB

projects.title: Mobile Trainer
projects.category: click here to see the code
projects.description: Keep track of your workouts with this easy to use mobile app. Node Web Application that includes visual graphs to display workout history over time.
